title: Hero Factory - Idle Factory Manager Tycoon
description:
***New feature : Boss Raid Updates!

Dive into the epic world of Hero Factory and unstop the massive hero production from your own factories to challenge powerful bosses.

Dispatch your heroes from the factories to hunt epic enemies down and earn plenty of golds to become a rich enough to expand your hero production lines. 

Various kinds of epic weapons and helmets! Collect unique items and discover new epic gear combinations to define your own hero style.

Merge an enchant stone and make your items more epic and powerful for the heroes

Collect golds from the monsters and upgrade the hero factories for stronger heroes.

Customize your heroes with epic skins and merge them into a united team. 

Hero Factory is an easy-to-play idle tycoon RPG where you can experience incomparable pleasure by managing your heroes and factories to stand against the enemies. Upgrade your heroes and factories with enchant stones and golds to create stronger army and send them to the battlefield for more epic rewards.

Download for free today and begin to make your own heroes and factories!


★ Hero Factory Features ★
 
* Various types of Heroes from different factories
Swashbuckler, Hunting Queen, Dagger, Witch, Axe King, Gunslinger and more heroes
 
* Strategical game play on the battlefield 
Strategically choose and use powerful skills to achieve a victory in the battle
 
* Managing and Enhancing Your Heroes and factories
Go on vacations countless times to increase your heroes’ stats and the factory production
 
* Tile-matching Mini-merge game
Merge enchant stones to find out more mysterious and powerful stones to upgrade your heroes and gears 
 
* Exciting Adventure
Explore Infinite epic battles throughout the journey with your heroes and obtain enormous rewards


♠ Terms of Use and Privacy Policy ♠  

https://sites.google.com/view/playhardco/terms-of-use
https://sites.google.com/view/playhardco/privacy-policy

developerAddress: 5, Nambusunhwan-ro 289-gil, Seocho-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea
recentChanges: A bug where Bomb Girl's Lava Weapon Skin (Flaming Bomb) could not be equipped has been fixed.
comments: I find it over all a very enjoyable game and would put 5 stars if not for one really big issue. The ads many time over it has (without asking) download whatever its advertising. It will do it when I dont press anything or when I'm hitting the x button! I've had the weather app 6 times and solitaire 4 times and a few others. I've undownload them all but makes it very tempting to also undownload this game with it sometimes. But I dont want to. Its fun reaching level 365 and playing a great game.

Updates are almost non existent...they haven't added new end game content in over 6 months. They also changed the boost system (watch an ad on demand for a 30m boost to gold and power) to a garbage rng p2w gear system. In doing so, they screwed over the player base that bought the ad-free pack, because the 30m boosts were the main use for the ad-free purchase. The graphics are great, but that's the only good thing I have to say overall.

I was enjoying the game for the first 24hr but now it will not go past 91%. I have to Uninstall it and start over to get it working again. I did that 3 times now and sick of starting over. Please fix!!! I do believe it has something to do with the Google play games log in for that normally displays around 91%.

2.3.3 nerfed high level medal farming into oblivion (96% nerf). 2.4.9 backed it off to a more reasonable 30% nerf. 2.5.2 added in a new raid and new raid gear, and if you get the new medal acquisition set you can now actually farm medals faster than before the first nerf. So if you were holding off on updating to farm medals, no need to do so anymore. Bug: My daily reset seems to randomly creep to later hours of the day when the app crashes sometimes, but that was a problem before the update.

Well can't find a way to contact support so I'm doing it here. Game is fun I keep playing it constantly when I'm not playing my computer. Anyway there's an issue with Bomb Girl on the super legendary bomb to spawn a larger version of herself for more damage. She spawns and dies instantly. Very annoying to waste all those tokens on.

title: Migraine Remedies
description:
Stop Chronic Migraine Pain and Tension Headaches From Destroying Your Life…

 

Proven steps anyone can take to overcome even the worst chronic head pain…

Are you someone that suffers from:

·        Tension Headaches

·        Migraine Headaches

·        Cluster Headaches

·        Stress Headaches…

Here’s a sneak peak at what you’ll learn:

·         What types of medical treatments are suitable for the type of headache you have, and how to talk to your doctor about them…

·         What natural remedies are worth trying if you suffer from this type of headache…

·         Find out if you can prevent your headache using preventative drugs including Imitrex or Relpax, or take advantage of natural remedies that prevent headaches…

·         Find out why it is so important to keep a headache diary, and how to start your very own, so you and your doctor can work closely to uncover the cause for your distress…

·         And much more!

Everyone knows what a headache feels like, but not everyone enjoys the ease of relief available…

Your brain is packed full of nerve endings that if triggered in just the right way, they send out pain signals to your head, resulting in you guessed it… headaches!

BUT… nobody deserves to be in pain most of the time. Headaches are one of the most common problems people face in the modern world. In fact, migraines rank as the 19th most common cause for disability.

What can you do about it?

Having severe headaches interfere with your ability to work and play. It’s time you found relief from your headache. Even if you suffer from occasional headaches, it’s time you found out what the exact cause is so you can find the perfect treatment!

When it comes to headaches, you will find that it is a condition that will be painful in the head, neck, and even back area. You will need to understand that the headache is not always just a pain. It could mean a sign of some sort and you will need to see a doctor if you get a lot of headaches. When it comes to symptoms or being a sign, you will need to consider that it is very rarely anything but a headache, but you will want to see a doctor if the headaches are persistent. 

As for causes for the headaches, you will find that it could be tension, eye strain, low blood sugar, sinuses, and even dehydration. You will also find that it could be a symptom of some life-threatening conditions like high blood pressure, brain tumors, and meningitis. You will also get a headache if you are injured in the head. Head trauma is very serious and you should seek medical treatment. You will also notice that the headache could simply be a part of your menstrual cycle, because you are fluctuating in estrogen levels. 

As for treatment you will be able to take some of the over-the-counter painkillers like Ibuprofen or aspirin. This will help you to get rid of the headache, but you will want to avoid some of your triggers, if you are able to identify them. Things like stress and even particular foods should be avoided in order for you to avoid having a headache. You will also want to seek medical attention if you feel that your headaches are persistent.

Most of your headaches are going to be nothing at all, however, you will still want to get checked out so that you can avoid having it manifest into something that is very serious. You will need to keep in mind that you will want to keep a headache journal. This way you can identify if you just have some specific trigger. Often your headaches will mean nothing, but it is always safe to jot down what you were doing when you got the headache and rather or not you have anything in common with other headaches. This way you can simply avoid the food or activity that makes you get headaches.

title: 72 Anticancer Recipes / my anti-cancer recipes
description:
Science has shown through studies that a healthy lifestyle and good nutrition can help prevent all types of cancer by 90%, because many foods contain antioxidants and phytonutrients that are natural anti-inflammatory. In My anti-cancer recipes, it includes various anti-cancer recipes to prevent or fight cancer of all types. My anti-cancer recipes, in addition to offering a wide variety of options and recipes, also provides the benefits or properties of each dish or recipe. Among the varieties of anti-cancer recipes you will find:

Fruit salad
Vegetable salads
Juices or Juices
Gazpachos
Cooked
Soups
Skewers
Pastry
Vegan sweets
Vegan rice dishes
Vegan tacos
Sushi
And much more.
Each prescription of My anti cancer recipes is structured in a simple way so you can do it without having much experience in the kitchen area.
My anti-cancer recipes is a platform that has more than 50 natural options to delight you at all times and above all healthy.
Did you know that our brain consumes a large part of body energy which, in turn, comes from nutritional intake? That's right, the better the fuel, the better the brain will work.
Conversely, unhealthy food decreases brain productivity, but proper nutrition increases the ability to concentrate and be more efficient.
In today's world, some people have a very fast pace of life, so it is common to resort to prepared and packaged foods and eat them on the fly.
This causes a big problem even if at first they do not see it, since industrially processed foods are made to make people eat more excesses than they should not.
It sounds exaggerated but at some point it creates a certain addiction. On the other hand, healthy eating helps you to awaken your gustatory system and to delight yourself with more different and natural flavors. Enjoying the benefits of a healthy diet without exceptions.
If what you eat on a daily basis contains many simple carbohydrates, your blood sugar level will skyrocket.
Excess sugar is dangerous for your body, because it starts releasing large amounts of insulin. This substance transports the sugar molecules from your bloodstream to the cells, so your blood glucose level drops and your body asks for more sugar. This starts a vicious circle in which the body constantly releases insulin and increases drowsiness.
A balanced lunch composed of complex carbohydrates, vegetables and proteins will help you get your energy level high.
With my anti-cancer recipes you will learn to eat healthy, to balance your body and mind. If your body gets everything it needs, it will make you notice it.
Eating well not only reduces mood swings, some foods can even help your body reduce the segregation of the stress hormone and cortisol. This way you will feel more balanced, more fit, healthier and live to the fullest.
Always keep in mind that a healthy diet today is a healthy body tomorrow.
Living a healthy life strengthens the organism, so you will be more protected from the first cause of mortality in contemporary society.
This means that in the long term it reduces the risk of cardiovascular diseases, high blood pressure, heart disease or heart attacks, cancer, diabetes and other diseases.
But if you eat badly, you will be more exposed to suffer one of the diseases mentioned above. Eat healthy, bet for your quality of life and also for your health in the future.
And you? What are you waiting for to start a healthy lifestyle and enjoy all these benefits? Remember that you only have one body and one life.

 Discover all the healthy and healthy options that the app offers my anti-cancer recipes!

Thanks for trusting us!!

In My anti-cancer recipes, it includes various anti-cancer recipes to prevent or fight cancer of all types. My anti-cancer recipes, in addition to offering a wide variety of options and recipes, also provides the benefits or properties of each dish or recipe. Among the varieties of anti-cancer recipes you will find:

Fruit salad
Vegetable salads
Juices or Juices
Gazpachos
Cooked
Soups
Skewers
Pastry
Vegan sweets
Vegan rice dishes
Vegan tacos
Sushi
And much more.
Each prescription of My anti cancer recipes is structured in a simple way so you can do it without having much experience in the kitchen area.
My anti-cancer recipes is a platform that has more than 50 natural options to delight you at all times and above all healthy.
Did you know that our brain consumes a large part of body energy which, in turn, comes from nutritional intake? That's right, the better the fuel, the better the brain will work.
Conversely, unhealthy food decreases brain productivity, but proper nutrition increases the ability to concentrate and be more efficient.
In today's world, some people have a very fast pace of life, so it is common to resort to prepared and packaged foods and eat them on the fly.
This causes a big problem even if at first they do not see it, since industrially processed foods are made to make people eat more excesses than they should not.
It sounds exaggerated but at some point it creates a certain addiction. On the other hand, healthy eating helps you to awaken your gustatory system and to delight yourself with more different and natural flavors. Enjoying the benefits of a healthy diet without exceptions.
If what you eat on a daily basis contains many simple carbohydrates, your blood sugar level will skyrocket.
Excess sugar is dangerous for your body, because it starts releasing large amounts of insulin. This substance transports the sugar molecules from your bloodstream to the cells, so your blood glucose level drops and your body asks for more sugar. This starts a vicious circle in which the body constantly releases insulin and increases drowsiness.
A balanced lunch composed of complex carbohydrates, vegetables and proteins will help you get your energy level high.
With my anti-cancer recipes you will learn to eat healthy, to balance your body and mind. If your body gets everything it needs, it will make you notice it.
Eating well not only reduces mood swings, some foods can even help your body reduce the segregation of the stress hormone and cortisol. This way you will feel more balanced, more fit, healthier and live to the fullest.
Always keep in mind that a healthy diet today is a healthy body tomorrow.
Living a healthy life strengthens the organism, so you will be more protected from the first cause of mortality in contemporary society.
This means that in the long term it reduces the risk of cardiovascular diseases, high blood pressure, heart disease or heart attacks, cancer, diabetes and other diseases.
But if you eat badly, you will be more exposed to suffer one of the diseases mentioned above. Eat healthy, bet for your quality of life and also for your health in the future.
And you? What are you waiting for to start a healthy lifestyle and enjoy all these benefits? Remember that you only have one body and one life.

 Discover all the healthy and healthy options that the app offers my anti-cancer recipes!

Thanks for trusting us!!
summary: My anti-cancer recipes offer a variety of options for a healthy life

title: Fight Cancer Boldly: Game(Unique) for Life
description:
Fight Cancer Boldly with organic vegetables and fruits.

A puzzle game that engages the brain and help gain confidence and knowledge of easily available vegetables and fruits to fight the demon, Cancer.

Organic farming lends us tremendous power to combat any disease.

In this game, I have used six vegetables and fruits ( combined) that are well known to provide enough power to the human body to fight inflammation. Instead of merely stating the facts, I designed it as a game that will engage the brains to a good extent.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Each fruit/veggie is mapped to a numerical value
- Tap any two fruits/veggies one after another to swap them
- Your objective is match all the column totals to the expected column totals
- Try to achieve this in the least number of swaps - let us use the brain smartly

Regards,
Prakash Vaithyanathan

PLEASE SLEEP WELL FOR HEART SAKE

Email: pvaithyanathan@gmail.com

title: Sand Balls - Puzzle Game
description:
Catch a ball!

Turn right, now a little to the left, and right again, than free up more space so the ball can move, and finally… Yes! Catch it!

Make sure you're careful and really pay attention—this is no simple football or volleyball. It's still a game, but with a sand ball! Have you ever seen anything like it before?

Even though it's made of sand, it's not yellow like you'd expect. Guess what color a sand ball can be? 🧶 Orange, green, pink, purple, blue, and many other vibrant colors of the rainbow and beyond! Your imagination will truly take flight!

Why do you need to collect these sand balls?

The first reason is "just for fun", and it's completely true. Why not? Everyone deserves to relax after the a hectic pace of a work day, and this game knows how to help with that! Simple actions, а fresh and cool design, a wide variety of tasks - this game has hundreds of levels so you can have lots of fun in your spare time.

The second reason is for strategy. The app features a tricky puzzle where you have to think carefully to beat the level: put colorful balls into the truck and transfer 🚚 them to a wonderful island located in the middle of nowhere. 

What's the point?

Now we come to the third reason. The game is well-organized in terms of plot. This means that while you play, you will be provided with challenging goals and inspiring missions like repairing buildings and advancing the overall infrastructure of the beautiful island. 🏖️

To sum up, collecting the balls is a good way to relax after a long day and improve your logical thinking at the same time. Press the button and download!

A bubble of additional interest is gained through

⚈ Golden keys. They open boxes with different surprises or even money inside.

⚈ Sticks and other obstacles in the way. This is no walk in the park!
⚈ A secret weapon that can destroy all balls. (You can restart the level.)
⚈ Long and varied routes. They look like a real puzzle. What road will you choose? Try to avoid getting lost!
⚈ A special white bubble. It turns into…..you'll find out on your own.

Make sure that you discover all the WOW effects…and hurry up! Your first truck is coming! Don't miss your chance to build an island!  

P.S. or maybe not just one incredible island, but several…

comments: Awful. This used to be a really relaxing game that I loved playing. Imagine my dismay when I open the game one day to see all my progress had disappeared (over 2000 levels played.) Instead, it has been replaced by non-relaxing garbage that begs for you to pay over £5 a week in subscription and randomly replaces progress you've made with cheap feeling graphics. Disappointed and uninstalling

Too many ads considering the length of the levels. I understand developers need to earn money, but when I spend more time on ads than playing the game, that's a developer failure no matter how fun the game is.
Used to like this game, but just lately there are levels that dont work properly or move to quick so you can not get all the stars. New to fix the problems on some of the levels.

Really not happy as when I get 2 the bar that the water should fill 2 press 2 open the bar doesn't work @ all, never so then I have problems skipping the level as it plays up + doesn't work either so I'm having 2 uninstall + re install 2 play the game again with no WiFi 🤬😠😠

I love this game. Its fun,for me entertaining,and the best thing if all,its bit filled with adverts. Really everything is good with the game. I'm not saying there isnt any ads, I'm just saying theres not a bunch of them.

title: Credit Karma - Free Credit Scores & Reports
description:
From spotting identity theft to getting personalized loan and credit card recommendations. Ready to make financial progress?

• Check your free credit scores – Take a look at your free credit reports to learn what affects your credit score and how you can take control.

• Explore the Relief Roadmap – Connect with government stimulus programs, unemployment benefits, debt relief opportunities, loan options and more.

• Credit Karma Savings – You worked hard for your money.  Now Credit Karma Savings makes your money work harder for you.  Open a savings account* in minutes and start earning a high-yield interest rate that's optimized across a network of 800+ banks.

• Free ID monitoring – We help you spot potential identity theft and give you tips for keeping your personal information safer.

• Free credit monitoring – Get credit alerts when we see important changes happen to your Equifax or TransUnion credit reports.

• Personalized Approval Odds – See which credit card and personal loan offers you’re more likely to get before applying.

• Credit card choices – Browse great credit card offers based on your unique credit profile.

• All things auto – Tune up your auto loan, save on car insurance, see open recalls and find vehicle records.

• Home sweet home – Calculate how much home you can afford, see personalized home loan offers and get a mortgage pre-qualification letter.

• Credit Karma Tax® – Filing your 2019 state and federal tax returns with the IRS is 100% free from start to finish, plus you’ll get our Maximum Refund Guarantee**, Audit Defense*** and dedicated support.

• Personal loan shopping – Whether you want to refinance credit card debt or borrow for an emergency, we’ll show you personalized offers based on your credit profile.

• Search unclaimed money – See if any of the more than $40 billion in unclaimed money has your name on it. 

• Financial calculators – You can see how different actions impact your finances with our free simple loan calculator, debt repayment calculator, mortgage refinancing calculator and more.

Join more than 100 million members and get all these features, and more, for free. Download the Credit Karma app now.

DISCLAIMER

*Banking services provided by MVB Bank, Inc., Member FDIC. Maximum balance and transfer limits apply. Maximum 6 withdrawals per monthly statement cycle.

**If you receive a larger federal tax refund amount or owe less in federal taxes using the same Tax Return Information when filing an amended return through another online tax preparation service, then you may be eligible to receive the difference in the refund or tax amount owed up to $100 (minimum $25) in the form of a gift card from Credit Karma Tax®. For details and eligibility, see https://www.creditkarma.com/tax/programterms#1.

***For details and eligibility, see https://www.creditkarma.com/lp/audit-defense-terms/.  Exclusions apply.

$2781 provided in the Credit Karma Tax phone screen image is the average 2018 Federal tax refund based on data provided by the IRS. $2973 is the average 2018 State tax refund in CA based on data provided by the CA Department of Revenue.

comments: I like the new layout and look. However, I would give 5 stars if I didn't have to search for what comes through on the alert notifications. Example, "there's a special loan offer", where?! I have search for it, when the app should go right to the information that is on alert notification, and not just the home page. Many alerts I just ignore, because I become frustrated trying to find them. Just open directly to them once pressed, otherwise I'm just wasting time seeing the same information.

I really love this app and the website. It's convenient and easy to use. My only complaint right now it that no matter how many times I click on "Recommendations" and scroll through it, it ALWAYS says there is 1 waiting. It's been going on for a while and it's on both desktop and mobile, so I know it's not just this latest update to the app. I don't like the advertising of the credit cards all the time but I get it, to keep the app free you need to have ads, no problem. Recommend me stuff all the time, I don't care, just register that I've seen it once I have.

Great app, I mean ausome app, in less than a year, this app has helped me get all three of my credit scores boosted. They were all between 510-530 and now, only a year later all three range from 622-643. So this app has done wonders. After a year of doing what the app said I went from having no credit to having 3 credit cards and owning a house. SO CREDIT KARMA GETS A 10 STAR RATING FROM ME. I USED TO SPEND MONEY AS FAST AS IT HIT MY POCKET NOW I HAVE OVER 10,000 IN SAVINGS AND I'M A PACK RAT.

Good app, but this latest update sucks. I don't like the new UI, and it feels slower now. And one thing that's been bugging me forever, when you open the app and it displays where you enter your pin, raise all the numbers up. It's way too low. But the in app UI sucks now. Change it back please. It was easier on the eyes before and easier to read

I've been monitoring my credit for a couple years now with Credit Karma, but this is thee worst update they've done! Not to mention, your score in the app will never be what a lender pulls. So I just use it to monitor credit card usage and any collections. Other than that, the app is garbage. Edit to include CK's response: I already know that. I am informing others, because clearly your formula isn't accurate. And if it's not accurate... it's not useful.

title: Migraine Treatment - Tips and Guide
description:
IMPORTANT:
*Users who have APKs with previous version, may need to receive android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE permission*

_________________


Migraine is a very common and disabling illness. Choosing a therapeutic agent that is best for each individual patient requires consideration of the patient's history, lifestyle, comorbid conditions, and individual preferences.

There are different types of migraine, and several treatment options. Migraine treatment approaches can be classified as acute treatments, which aim to reverse or stop the migraine symptoms, and preventive treatments, which aim to reduce the frequency and severity of migraines. Many people with migraine need both types of treatment. Another treatment strategy is to identify and avoid personal triggers.


In this app, we will discuss about:

• Migraine Treatment - Symptoms and Causes
• Migraine Treatment - Diagnosis
• Migraine Treatment - Medication
• Migraine Treatment - Acupuncture
• Migraine Treatment - Supplements and Herbs
• Migraine Treatment - Feverfew
• Migraine Treatment - Methysergide
• How to Use Acupressure Points for Migraine Headaches


[ Features ]

- Easy & simple book guide app
- Periodic update of content
- Support Offline Database (So, you can open it without internet connection)
- You can ask questions from our experts
- Send us your suggestions and we will add it


A little explaination about Migraine Treatment:

Migraine headaches are a neurological condition that occurs physiologically. People, who suffer from migraine headaches can experience a wide variety of symptoms including nausea, vomiting, altered body perception, disturbance of vision and severe headaches. It can cause debilitating effects, causing someone to miss work, or school for sometimes more than one day. Unfortunately, there has been no proven cause of migraines. It has been linked to several different theories such as genetic, but nothing is concrete.

In addition to having no cause, there is no cure for migraines either. There are several types of migraine treatments on the market but not every treatment works for every person who is suffering from migraines. Not every type of migraine treatment will work for everyone. One treatment may work for someone and not the next person. This is understandable especially in the case of prescription medication and over the counter medicine. Medication affects everyone differently.


Download Migraine Treatment App to find more knowledge and tips..

title: Super Slime Simulator: Satisfying ASMR & DIY Games
description:
Play with slime on your mobile device. Stretch it, squish it, knead it, pop it - just like you would with real slime or goo. Enjoy that oddly satisfying feeling without the mess or sticky fingers!
With tons of slimes to choose from, this app is for slime noobs and pro slime veterans, young and old, boys and girls! You can even take animated pictures of your slime and share them with your friends using your favorite social media apps.

App features:

- Play with your simulated slime right on your phone.
- Realistic slime simulation: Stretch it, squish it, knead it, pop it - just like real slime!
- Rich slime gallery: Gooey, fluffy, cheesy, glittering and many more.
- Introducing: Magical Slimes! Kids, don’t try to make these at home - because you can’t!
- The Ugliest & Yuckiest: Flesh, brains, worms and more - these WILL gross out your friends.
- Not all slimes were created equal: Unique texture, color and behavior for each slime.
- DIY! Create your very own slime. Choose from multiple materials, colors and even add glitter, foam and other amazing stuff.
- Fun area: enjoy great slime activities including: Guessing Game & Slime Painter.
- Shake it till you make it: Shake your phone to undo stretches.
- Oddly Satisfying Sounds: Turn up the volume and listen to your slime squishing as you touch it.
- Take animated pictures of your slime and share them with everyone!

FOLLOW US at
Instagram @superslimesimulator

Please add a thermochromic slime that changes color when touched.

title: Pull the Pin
description:
In this game full of satisfying graphics and innovative levels, you can challenge yourself, your brain, and your friends! It’s you against physics and the tricky levels — WHO WILL WIN?

All balls have to go into the pipe … can you remove the pins in the right order and make it happen?

It should be simple: gravity pulls the balls down towards the pipe. But then pins are in the way! Can you help out and flip away the pins and get the balls to where they are supposed to be?

But wait: there is another level of trickery! Sometimes some of the balls are colorless: before they go into the pipe, they need to touch a color ball, so the color spreads to them as well. So simple yet so tricky!

All balls have to go into the pipe … can you remove the pins in the right order and make it happen?

It should be simple: gravity pulls the balls down towards the pipe. But then pins are in the way! Can you help out and flip away the pins and get the balls to where they are supposed to be?

But wait: there is another level of trickery! Sometimes some of the balls are colorless: before they go into the pipe, they need to touch a color ball, so the color spreads to them as well. So simple yet so tricky!
summary: Can you reach the pinnacle?
developerAddress:
Rheinsbergerstrasse76/77
10115 Berlin
Deutschland
recentChanges: Bug fixes + performance improvements. Thank you for playing!
comments: The first problem is the puzzles are far too simplistic to be entertaining. Finishing them does not provide any kind of sense of accomplishment. The biggest problem is that this is another app that exists as an engine to vomit ads at you that stop any media currently playing. Listening to a podcast? Not when one of these ads starts. And there are so many of them. Fail the puzzle? Here's an ad. Did you win? Congratulations here's an ad. In 10 minutes if game I spent over 5 of it watching ads.

Very easy, mindless game. Very little skill required. Has a lot of noisy adds, many with no volume off button, so don't play at work for a mindless break. Many adverts crash the game, resulting in having to replay the last round. I've lost interest now. Levels never get hard, & repeat earlier rounds. Boring.

A Little bit inane. Not much difficulty @ higher levels. It took abiut 15 minutes to reach level 45. Most of the time was taken up by adverts for other games. Realising it is your bread and butter to have a multitude of games available, and being played, with adverts inserted from time to time, but not at every level change whilst progressing through the game. I suggest (example) don't attempt or try to get people to role play, when they are playing logic or puzzle games.

This game has a lot of potential, unfortunately that potential is negated by the total overuse of advertisements, a level taking 5 seconds is then followed by up to 40 seconds of advertisements... deleted, Yes I understand the manufacturers of the game have to make a living and advertisements is their way of doing so, but taking the fun out of the game is not the way forward😥

Do you like puzzles that are very, very, very simple? Do you like spending lots of your time watching ads? If so, this might be the app for you. I actually find that I do play it from time to time. Sometimes I'm just in the mood for mindless winning with no effort. The game eagerly congratulates you after every simple win. I'm on level 353 now, so obviously I've spent some time playing it. It doesn't get any harder. A couple of the last few levels I played were literally un-losable.

comments: This app is awesome. All the songs you could want, no commercials. You got the videos, everything I like about YouTube minus the commercial interruptions. And you know that YouTube has got some long commercials when you're trying to listen and do other things, you have to stop, go stop the commercial so you can hear music again worse than radio!! This app is rocking!! My YouTube replacement. Did I mention you can download songs for offline listening. And its free!! What else could you ask for?

I love that I can make playlists & edit songs within the playlist(s) by adding or removing songs, plus you can sort the songs in the order you want. I love this App ..and recommend it to others; I already recommended it to F&F!

This app is definitely worth it no question. Tons of music available for any mood. And really good quality as well. But what there's more!!! Seemingly endless music and the app is very easy to use. Wide selection and user friendly what more could anyone possibly want. In the world of digital everything it's a win win.

Listen almost exclusively to this. At work, gym and car. I conveniently find all my trance favorites without interruption. I can also access other items such as Google, etc while still listening. Some of the initial advertising is odd, but I click past that and play my music. I dont have to hsve this open to a full screen to listen to. Its great for me but im not into mainstream music, I'm strictly older trance music which I find abundantly here.

This app is excellent I love it just sitting here finding all my music I'm so 💯 happy I've been looking for an app that doesn't give me a hard time about this is it, it's so easy and words can't describe what is happening to me now it's the best 5 🌟 is excellent but not enough because this is more than I expected so much more to say keep it up much love and thank you ❤️❤️❤️ this app is awesome ☺️😘😘😘

title: Pregnant Mother Simulator - Virtual Pregnancy Game
description:
I'm Pregnant 👩‍❤️‍👩 . The story of pregnant mother starts from the pregnancy test in this amazing pregnant simulator. With motherhood news you are now a pregnant mommy. 
Experience real life simulation in giving birth games and family games.

🩸 Virtual Pregnancy Video Game: Virtual Pregnant simulator depicits the life game story of a mother right from the start of the pregnancy. Pregnant mom is so excited about the newborn 👶🏼. She has to take care of herself for babycare. 

🩸 Pregnant Mom Life:  She now has to follow a managed life in 1st, 2nd and third trimesters. In first trimester she has to rest avoid stairs and take necessary precautions to avoid miscarriage. 
2nd trimester she has to start workouts pregnancy workouts and pregnancy yoga exercises has to performed in her daily routine along with a healthy diet. 

🩸 Childbirth Games: Pregnant games for girls normal delivery. Grow your family in this mother simulator game. Pregnant daycare routine must be followed that includes; Having enough sleep, doing yoga and exercises, taking your vitamins and following a healthy diet plan. Being pregnant and babycare isn't an easy task. Check with your pregnancy doctor games. Take plenty of fruits 🍏. 
In this babysitting game mommy & newborn baby checkup is very important as it can lead to many complications. As a babysitter keep checking blood pressure
and Blood sugar levels of the pregnant mom to monitor her health and normal growth of baby.

Features:
★ A mother game who will perform her daily activities after being pregnant. 
★ Pregnancy test and doctor visit for routine checkup. 
★ Brisk Walking and other pregnancy exercises in this mom game. 
★ Taking healthy diet and monitoring baby growth. 
★ Complete pregnancy period to parenthood.  
★ Medical care of Pregnant Mama. 
★ Patient mama's clothes and other accessories during parenthood period. 
★ Be prepared for the pregnant mama emergancy doctor in case of Cesarean.

👍🏻 Your newborn baby will be active if you are active. Go to the hospital and meet your doctor in this hospital game. This is a family game, a mother game, a hospital game and
 ultimately an amazing pregnancy game as you will be going through all these phases of experience in a fun and realistic way. 

👍🏻 Pregnancy To-dos in this fun game of 2020. One of the best simulation games 2020. Pregnant surgery game will end at your delivery day. Regularly visit your 
pregnancy doctor in this hospital game. You must also be prepared for the hospital emergency for the labor just in case you get into any complications. Also keep your
maternity bag ready. Be a good pregnant mommy. 

Don't forget to give your feedback at neelumbajiplc@gmail.com

comments: This game is ok I would never play this in my freetime, and I don't like the animaton. It's terrible and the animation sucks! It looks like the creator just rushed it when it could have been a good game but you rushed it. If your pregnant and you want to learn about being pregnant I do recommend, but for all of you that are not, look at something else!!!

The is perfect for pregnant women. It teaches you everything i am very proud of the creators. But the reason i reduced a star because you cannot operate the woman that's a little disappointing. Creators if you are reading this its a humble request to add this feature please please. I love this game and i dont want to uninstall it.

Very good game...portrays a pregnant mother's life accurately. Excellent! The only thing is that I felt the 'Baby Care' level a bit boring. The rest was all excellent! Going to hospital, ordering items from iPhone....very good. Just improve 'Baby Care' level and then include more and more of levels...overall, nice game!👍👍 sufficient to get 4 stars!!

FINALLY A GAME WITH EASY CONTROLS !!!!!! I love this game I just wish it had more levels and more to do so far everything is so accurate! Maybe giving baby a bath more levels of baby getting older feeding him in a high chair changing clothes etc mom cooking going to the store taking baby for a walk in stroller or if baby grows and walks as a toddler take him to play ! I'm just glad theres no timer either ! I totally love this game so I'll keep it downloaded and wait for more levels ! Great game!

This app is amazing the little details are so incredible! It feels so realistic however there are some small issues in my opinion I don't understand why when you buy clothes on the pregnancy app it shows dresses and a t-shirt, if she can only wear the track suits why not just have her buy the track suits instead of the dresses? Also it's a little annoying that when you have a baby boy he's in a super girly nursery I think all the baby stuff should had been made gender neutral. Great game tho!

title: Canon PRINT Inkjet/SELPHY
description:
Canon PRINT Inkjet/SELPHY is the print and scan app for PIXMA, MAXIFY and SELPHY from your Android smartphone & tablet*1/2.

*1: Available for devices with an ARM processor only.
*2: Functions and services may not be available for all printers or in all countries, regions, and environments.

[Key features]

- Photo Print *3
  Photo trimming is available

- Document Print *4
  Print PDF files & Microsoft Office® documents

- Web page Print *4
  Easily print web pages from “Share”

- Scan
　Seamlessly scan & save documents and photos as PDF or JPEG

- Cloud
  Link to PIXMA Cloud Link service
  Print pictures and documents from select social media platforms and storage sites, as well as crafts from CREATIVE PARK with PIXMA Cloud Link from just about anywhere

- Copy
  You can adjust your copy settings from your smartphone or tablet
  Especially helpful on printers that don't have an LCD screen

- Smartphone Copy
  Take a picture of a document with your smart device and apply auto skew correction for a print

- Printer Settings
  Allows you to check your Ink levels, ink model number, buy ink, and access an online manual for your printer

- Bluetooth setup *5
  Allows you to easily print and scan without registering your printer, receive error messages, and skip password entry when copying by a remote user interface

*3: Only JPEG files supported.
*4: Incorrect print results may occur if data does not display properly on the screen.
*5: Function available for Android 5.1 and later. This function is not guaranteed to operate on all Android devices
*NFC function removed.

[Supported printers]

- Canon Inkjet Printers
PIXMA TS series, TR series, MG series, MX series, G series, E series, PRO series, MP series, iP series, iX series 
MAXIFY MB series, iB series
imagePROGRAF PRO / TM / TA series
*Except for some models

- Compact Photo Printer
SELPHY CP900 series,CP910, CP1200, CP1300

[Supported OS]
Android 4.4 and later

[Supported medias]

- Media types
Plain Paper, Photo Paper Plus Glossy II, Photo Paper Pro Platinum, Photo Paper Plus Semi-gloss, Photo Paper
Photo Paper Pro, Photo Paper Pro II, Photo Paper Plus Glossy, Photo Paper Pro Luster, Glossy Photo Paper, Matte Photo Paper, Ink Jet Hagaki, Hagaki, High Resolution Paper, Other Photo Paper,Greeting Card, Cardstock

- Media sizes *7
Letter 8.5"x11" 22x28cm, Legal 8.5"x14" 22x36cm, A4, A5, 4"x6" 10x15cm, 5"x7" 13x18cm, 8"x10" 20x25cm, A3, A3+ 13"x19" 33x48cm, 10"x12" 25x30cm, B5, B4, 14"x17" 36x43cm, L 89x127mm, 2L 127x178mm ,Hagaki 100x148mm ,Credit Card 2.13"x3.39" 54x86mm, Card 2.17"x3.58" 55x91mm, Wide 4"x7.1" 101.6x180.6mm, Square 5"x5" 13x13cm, Square 3.5"x3.5" 9x9cm, Square 4"x4" 10x10cm, Square 12"x12" 30x30cm, 7"x10" 18x25cm, 11"x17" 28x43cm

comments: I absolutely adore this app. Yes at first it is a little confusing to operate however if you just follow the instructions for connecting devices it really is easy to use and so much fun creating art, pictures, business cards, sticker labels large and small plus so much more!!! I give it 10 * all the way around!

Can't find my canon mg5760 which is supposed to be compatible so what's the point of this app? I can print from my pc on the same network, my router finds the printer so it's definitely this app that's broken. Canon you had one job and failed at it.

I recently bought a pixma photo printer, and cannot set it up for the life of me. I work in technology and am extremely competent, but I cannot get my printer to connect. The guide online is not an accurate reflection of the app. When searching for a printer, it searches without giving me any additional options, and always says the printer is not found. It might be a good app, but i can't use it!
I attempted to install the app on my laptop but after fiddling around with it for half an hour I changed tactics and installed the app on my phone. Up and running within 2 minutes

I didnt know how to make it work for some time, but my confusion was not the fault of the app. I attempted to make it wok using a very old archos tablet. Was then amazed at its performance with a very old but stylish sony tablet, then, obliged at last to buy an iPhone, discovered that it works perfectly with this app, without my help at all. Dont know why. But very happy with that.

title: Hello Stars
description:
Hello Stars is a puzzle video solving game.  It's easy to learn but very diffcult to master.

The job of each level is to guide a ball from a predetermined start point so that it touches all of the stars placed on the level. The ball and nearly all objects on the screen are affected by gravity. The first few levels are almost too easy, but as the difficulty increases you'll be thankful that you were able to practice the fundamentals of draw. As the game progresses, you'll have to use all sorts of theory to figure out a solution for each puzzle. 


The Game Features:
★ Hundreds of ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?
★ 220 of physics puzzles, more levels are comming soon!
★ Flexible thinking is going to become the key to victory.
★ Solutions can be found in the end of each level.
★ Play 100+ of challenging
★ Interesting physics puzzles, they're not as easy as they look.


We need translations
Please help us translate Hello Stars into your language like Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Italian, Russian and other languages.
You can contact us via this email: 📮cashgamesteam@gmail.com📮. Thanks for your effort to help us.

Feel free to contact us by cashgamesteam@gmail.com if you have any problem about Hello Stars.

summary: Must use brain to finish all levels.
developerAddress: WAYSONCOMMERCIAL BUILDING 28CONNAUGHT ROAD WEST SHEUNG WANHONG KONG
comments: Fun Game, Too Many Ads. Finished a level? Watch an ad. Don't want an ad? Here's one anyway. Here's another ad, I didn't skip the last one fast enough. Way too much. I timed it and for every 2 minutes of actual gameplay, I had 3 minutes 48 seconds of total ads

It is really good in terms of the difficulty and the different gamemodes and I have to say that the sound and music is really good. There maybe too many ads but the is a cross button to click it away so not really a problem and I like the tutorial level as it is animated.

Annoying the app continues to show notifications even after they have been turned off, They just use a different push notification. I have had 6 notifications in 15 mins and I have now removed the app.

This game is fine in concept, unfortunately, it doesn't work in practice. A lot of puzzles require precise solutions, if you have big fingers, you've already lost. If you touch a wall, a simple solution would be to have the line skip over the wall, instead, you have to backtrack your fingere to draw it at a new angle. Not very practical, developers. This game was not made with the intention of satisfaction.

It's really unfortunate, because this game is kinda like Crayon Physics Deluxe, which I own but won't work. However, there's an ad after almost every quick puzzle, and you can't skip until the whole ad has played. Couple this with the fact that you can't simply pay to remove ads, but must purchase a subscription that's around 12 dollars a month. That's a little past insane.

title: Fanatical Basketball
description:
Dribble, shoot, score! Hit the court with Fanatical Basketball, the world’s #1 stunningly immersive basketball game!

Grab the ball, shoot from the downtown or perform spectacular dunks, and rise to the challenge with Fanatical Basketball! Build and manage your team, go head to head in 5-on-5 action and dominate your opponents in nba style matches. Win or go home with lethal shot in playoff seasons. KABOOM!

Game Features:
- Realistic 3D graphics, crazy fluid animations and smart touch controls
- Jam with 30+ teams of customizable 3D players
- Quick Game mode and League Matches mode

Interesting game, graphics and sound good but, inability to move to the next stage though I was qualified, by winning in the previous stage and also investing the needed amount, is a put off... So please I hope you would work on it ASAP. Then I will give 5 stars

Well the game is petty good but when i get a wide open 90% it misses and i cant stand that and when you go for a dunk it automatically just like looks like you're doing a layup but like why does it have to be in slow motion and when I go to unlock character I mean a new ball it just new ball action or or closed it just says new ball a lot and then he doesn't even show nothing like the game and then I'll give you a 5-star rating because this game should be like NBA 2K 20

This is great, but I don't like the graphics of this game ,I'm dizzy by it's movements and the worst of all even I'm gonna dunk,shoot in 3 it won't shoot please fix it. So for now I'm giving it a 3. Until you fix it.
The game is good and enjoyable but when ever I want to pass I will send it to my men but it will go to the other team please fix it but it is a good game i am sure that people will like it

title: Fight Cancer Boldly: Game (Free)
description:
Fight Cancer Boldly with organic vegetables and fruits.

A puzzle game that engages the brain and help gain confidence and knowledge of easily available vegetables and fruits to fight the demon, Cancer.

Organic farming lends us tremendous power to combat any disease.

In this game, I have used six vegetables and fruits ( combined) that are well known to provide enough power to the human body to fight inflammation. Instead of merely stating the facts, I designed it as a game that will engage the brains to a good extent.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Each fruit/veggie is mapped to a numerical value
- Tap any two fruits/veggies one after another to swap them
- Your objective is match all the column totals to the expected column totals
- Try to achieve this in the least number of swaps - let us use the brain smartly

Is there a paid app without any ads?
Yes, of course. Please visit the link:

https://play.google.com/apps/publish/?account=6168269411722344012#AppDashboardPlace:p=com.gforgoodness.fightcancerboldly&appid=4973568647372775045



I am a Science Tutor and also a Cancer Researcher. My focus is mainly on skin cancer and I am involved with formulations that could help skin cancer patients from a clinical perspective. For any researcher, lack of funds is always a hurdle. Instead of seeking donations or grants for further research and clinical trials, I am trying to help myself through the paid app.


Regards,
Prakash Vaithyanathan

PLEASE SLEEP WELL FOR HEART SAKE

Email: pvaithyanathan@gmail.com

https://play.google.com/apps/publish/?account=6168269411722344012#AppDashboardPlace:p=com.gforgoodness.fightcancerboldly&appid=4973568647372775045



I am a Science Tutor and also a Cancer Researcher. My focus is mainly on skin cancer and I am involved with formulations that could help skin cancer patients from a clinical perspective. For any researcher, lack of funds is always a hurdle. Instead of seeking donations or grants for further research and clinical trials, I am trying to help myself through the paid app.


Regards,
Prakash Vaithyanathan

PLEASE SLEEP WELL FOR HEART SAKE

Email: pvaithyanathan@gmail.com

title: Call me a Legend - Game of Battle & Love
description:
Playboy x Call Me A Legend

12 beautiful Playmates are trapped in the zombie world. Rescue all the Playmates before they are gone!  
Time is limited for all legends to finish the rescue-missions and set them free from the zombies. They promise to thank you and you won't be disappointed.
Meet the Playmates of the month including Gia, Audrey, Raquel, Stephanie, Sophie, Monica....etc, they are waiting for you to rescue them. 

Call me a Legend is a free RPG game simulation with plenty of love affairs and politics! Become a Legend in the game, which enables you to get rich and gain power! But beware of zombies, because they are lurking behind every corner!

Main features:
✔ Love affairs - Increase intimacy with girls by dating them and giving them gifts. Become a Legend among girls!
✔ Raising a family - Take care of your wife and she will take care of your life and your children. Groom your heirs!
✔ Political games - Get rich and powerful!
✔ Forge Alliances - Recruit heroes which will help you defeat the zombies! 
✔ Develop the camp and upgrade your heroes to make them stronger. Be the top of the legend!
✔ Go on Quests - send expeditions to explore new territories and find more survivors.
✔ Chat online with other players - exchange your experiences! Who is the Legend at the end?
✔ Set the record - We challenge you to try to become the best-ranked player on our worldwide ranking list! Are you the Legend?

Play Call me a Legend for FREE now! Get Rich, Gain Power Now!

© 2020 Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. Playboy and the Rabbit Head Design are trademarks of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. and used under license by Empire Studios Inc.

comments: Downloaded the game to see what it was about. Waiting for it to load which was exceptionally long load time, only to get to the main background screen and nothing else. Nothing to click on to proceed any further. Just the main screen. Read the reviews for the gane and seems to me like the devs for this gane arent sure what they are doing. Waste of time.

Very challenging game. Excellent girls, can build soldiers to whatever strength you want according to your resources. Would recommend this game if your diligent. The bad, it's a little glitchy, have had 2 uninstall and reinstall several times this last week in order for the game to load. Also likes to disconnect from the server, occasionally it won't reconnect. Once required a reinstall. Fortunately no game play was lost and no penalties. Kudos to the DEVS for the mini game and variety.

The is a good game but it sucks that you have to collect 800 puzzle pieces for most girls and sucks that the girls never get put in the rotation, so I have alot of puzzle pieces and never get the chance to get them, unless they start putting back into rotation then I'm going to delete the game

Beware, extremely low probabilities and undisclosed gacha odds. Did over 150+ searches and did not gain a single point in progression towards a character. Needs more work and bug fixes. Half of the content says "Coming Soon," and even a screen still shows as "Beta testing." Servers are pretty much dead, no social aspect and lacks co-cop related content. Also don't like that some events run at 4am in the morning and only last 2 hours.

Fun enough game if you're patient. The beauties are ridiculous but entertaining and at least they aren't Anime style. There's enough to do to keep you coming back and figure out. Like that if you miss out on something it will come around again in a few months. PTP helps but you don't need to if you're patient and don't mind grinding it out.

title: Breast Cancer: Information about breast cancer
description:
Find breast cancer facts and statistics, risk factors, screening, diagnosis and treatment. If you've been diagnosed with breast cancer you're bound to have questions. Here's what you need to know about Breast Cancer.

 Features:
1.  About Breast Cancer: Warning Signs Of BREAST CANCER That Many Women Ignore (listen to the audio)
2.  Breast Cancer Risk and Prevention
3.  Breast Cancer Early Detection and Diagnosis
4.  Understanding a Breast Cancer Diagnosis: Types of Breast Cancer
5.  Breast Cancer Treatment: Breast Cancer Staging Nucleus Health (listen to the audio)
6.  Breast Reconstruction Surgery: Should I Get Breast Reconstruction Surgery?
7.  Non-cancerous Breast Conditions: Fibrosis and Simple Cysts in the Breast
8.  Living as a Breast Cancer Survivor: Emotions and Breast Cancer
9.  Yoga: The breast cancer news round-up: Kadcyla, statins and yoga
10.  What types of cancer are diagnosed as Stage 0 and 1 Breast Cancer?
11.  Surgery Choices for Women with DCIS or Breast Cancer. Are You Facing a Decision about Surgery for DCIS or Breast Cancer?
12.  Causes

The causes of breast cancer aren't fully understood, making it difficult to say why one woman may develop breast cancer.
Trusted information about breast cancer!

comments: This is an app that i found while researching breast cancer. I downloaded every app, checked them out, and deleted them. I kept this one because it seemed to want to organize my rollercoastal ride of emotions and answer my endless questions. Thank you. I'm now heading into surgery a little better informed.
I learned many new things regarding breast cancer, but I quit trying to read it! The font is too light (not enough contrast) and TOO SMALL.
Very informative App with pictures as well.
I read this app and got alot of information that I needed. Thank you
Love the info that it giving
